summary: The Keystone Pipeline has transported over 3 billion barrels of crude oil from Canada to U.S. refineries since 2010. Keystone's accident history is similar to other pipelines, but the severity of its spills has worsened in recent years due to 2 large spills in 2017 and 2019. The Department of Transportation required Keystone operator TC Energy to investigate and address the root causes of the...
title: Pipeline Safety: Information on Keystone Accidents and DOT Oversight
